column1: Little Goat Diner////The only thing I can say about this place is that it is very unique to try once if you're visiting from out of town
column2: but if I was from Chicago or lived in the area
column3: I honestly probably wouldn't frequent the place. Little Goat is essentially a diner with a menu not expected of a diner which is really cool and interesting
column4: but at the end of the day
column7: but without the great prices of a regular diner.
